data.text:
@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC Forgot to say that I really love the whole gang: Tanya (for years now, from On Air), and I got to know and like Becca through this podcast. Also @MarkMohelnitzky & @EastonAllyn & Amy 💖💕 Dream team, goals 😘😘
https://t.co/YXZi6mQrej

@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC I loved this episode so much! Just listened to it for the 3rd time 🙆🎧 I can't get enough of it! Loved Tanya's story with Nial, Becca's with JLo&ARod, Mark's with JLo, Ryan of course & Sarah ❤ Can't wait next episode with @TheLadyGang I mean, what next? You outdone yourselves💯
@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC Seriously one of my all time favorite episodes!!! Soooooo good!!

@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC I had high hopes for this episode with Ryan and I was right. It was fantastic guys!! ✌💯 Plus you also had Sarah! ❤ Couldn't ask for more. Another night that I will go to sleep with a smile on my face. ✨ 💫 🙌🎧 https://t.co/CaPuXUzwD6

@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC I just finished & I loved it.  Sarah is always fun to listen too. Please have her back soon. The hosts were low-key Japril warriors. I👀 you.

@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC Looking forward to the next time you'll get Sarah over😉 Really great podcast and I totally get why you didn't ask all of your questions cause it's still hard to process to this day!

@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC I’ve been waiting for it! This will be great! Can’t wait to listen! 
#podcast #ScrubbingIn 😃
@ScrubbingInPod @RyanSeacrest @beccatilley5 @TanyaRad @OnAirWithRyan @sarahdrew @GreysABC SO EXCITED FOR SARAH DREW!! Started as fan girls at CHOC Prom, now we’re here 🙌🏼
